titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. Thomas Mundy, William Tatum, and Joel Gray, Indictment
CWG7258

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Todd Circuit Court.
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
against } October Term 1865
Thomas Mundy, William Tatum Jr. Joel Gray.

The Grand Jury of Todd County in the name and the Authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky: accuse Thomas Mundy, William Tatum Jr. and Joel Gray, of the offence of unlawfull Shooting, committed as follows, Viz: the said Thomas Mundy, William Tatum Jr. and Joel Gray on the 10" day of August 1865 in the County aforesaid -- did willingly maliciously and unlawfully with loaded pistols Shoot at James Henderson and with the intent to Kill him Said Henderson but did not Kill or wound him said Henderson by said unlawfull Shooting as aforesaid and c -- against the peace and dignity of the Commowealth of Kentucky.

J. D. Cristian, Foreman Grand Jury
E. P. Campbell, Attorney for the Commonwealth.

Information given by.
James Henderson
Joseph Hooper
J,, H,, Hester
Thomas M. Sherrod.
A. J. Richmond

A Copy Attest
J. S. Grumbley D. C. for Ben T. Perkins C. T. C. C
We of the Jury find the parties Thomas Mundy & Wm F. Tatum Guilty as charged in the Indictment and fine them Two hundred and fifty dollars each.

It is therefore considered by the Court that the Plaintif recover of the Defendants Munday and Tatum the Sum of Two hundred and fifty dollars each together with her cost herein expended and that they be taken &C,
Bench Warrant to issue & Bail fixed at $100. each

Comth
vs } copy of Indictment for unlawfull Shooting
Thomas Mundy
Wm Tatum J &c
A true bill
J. D. Christian
foreman Grand Jury
Filed Octo 21st 1865
Ben T. Perkins C, T, C, C,
